revised_title: Discovery of a New Gas in the Atmosphere: Krypton
tldr: In 1898, William Ramsay and Morris W. Travers discovered a new gas in the atmosphere, which they named "krypton." This gas has a unique spectrum and is heavier than argon. They found that krypton is an element and has a density of around 22.5, making it a monatomic gas. The discovery expanded the understanding of the composition of Earth's atmosphere and added a new element to the periodic table.
